import React, { useState } from 'react' import './FormPart.css' const FormPart = () => { const [nameBox, setNameBox]=useState("r") const [clgBox, setClgBox]=useState("r") const handleNameChange=(event)=>{ console.log(event.target.value) setNameBox(event.target.value) } const nameList=[ { stname:"Siva", college:"Lmcst" }, ] return (
{nameList.map((ele,idx)=>{ return ( ) })}
Serial No Name College
{idx+1} {ele.stname} {ele.college}
) } export default FormPart
